mean_en: the soft thick mass of hair that grows on the body of some animals; the skin of an animal with the fur still on it, used especially for making clothes; a piece of clothing, especially a coat or jacket, made of real or artificial fur; an artificial material that looks and feels like fur
sentence: A fur coat is very warm, but very expensive!
sentence_trans: 毛皮外套很温暖，但也很昂贵！
